reviewText:
Amazing true story of the Mother of Jesus appearing to a nun in Ohio from 1957-1960 asking her to work towards getting a statue of her likeness according to the image she gave to Sr. Mary Ephrem with the purpose of people all over
America changing their lives to reflect moral purity and conversion to her son Jesus Christ.
The information is inspiring and faith building. Unfortunately it is being marketed by con men who have misrepresented their roles in spreading this beautiful devotion.
